title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: Have you been wondering how much  Helium   token  price  will be worth in few years from now? Should I hold or sell my Helium  token ? There is a site that give you all the answers. Coinriders will figure out for you how much Helium  Mars   will be worth in the next years and the next 5 days. Helium coin price predictionCoinriders updates prediction every 3 minutes according to smart technical indicators.Link to prediction:https://coinriders.com/coin-prediction/helium

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: I just came here after you were making a few threads in a row and it's all about advertising the prediction that came from that site. Does that site linked to you as an owner or something else? It doesn't make sense to see that and why don't you create a single thread that will be focusing to give an update about your site rather than spreading the prediction like this? This is quite spamming the section. HNT was a crap project. If bitcoin goes to the dip and this project will always be dipping as well.
